comment._content: WILLIAM H. PAGE, LAWYER, DIES AT 74; Descendant of Chief Justice Marshall Had Big Practice Here and Abroad. Source: select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10C10FA3C5B1B7B...

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: I can't read the article above, but newjerseyhills.com/bernardsville_news/obituaries/shirley-... affirms that he was an attorney and a former president of the New York Athletic Club. See also the photographs in New-York tribune., January 03, 1913, Page 10 New-York tribune., January 22, 1905, Page 10
